sentence.Network_cn: 《知识源泉》波士顿,麻省, 哈佛商学院出版社, 1995年.

list.abs: eldritch giants dwell in isolated mountaintop towers or in deep caverns near wellsprings of arcane power .邪术巨人居住在孤立山顶的塔上或是附近有奥术能量温泉的洞穴深处。
蛮荒海岸 wild shore纳克迈尼圣泉 nek'mani wellspring薄雾谷 mistvale valley
i will not only resemble a wellspring ., 也不止像泉源.

this book provides ideas on corporate and product literature , annual reports and direct marketing , and new media , providing a wellspring of ideas for designers creating client brochures .这本书提供的思想对企业和产品说明书，年度报告和直接的市场营销和新媒体，提供了一个源泉想法设计师创造客户小册子。
